item.title: Hello world!
item.description: Hello everyone, in this blog I’d like to record a few interesting findings about programming. Test paragraph Test bold. Test italic. Blockquotes ? blockquote text. again. and again. and again again again. Shortcodes This year is : 2020 wtf Images: .Resize "100x" This is the shortcode used in the examples above: layouts/shortcodes/imgproc.html {{ $original := .Page.Resources.GetMatch (printf "*%s*" (.Get 0)) }} {{ $command := .
